articles.title: ‘House of the Dragon’ Precap: One Burning Question Ahead of Episode 5 - The Ringer
articles.description: Every Friday, Ringer staffers who haven’t read any of the ‘Game of Thrones’ books gather to answer one key question ahead of Sunday’s ‘House of the Dragon’ episode. This week’s topic: ethical compromise.
